jobs.title: KMC Health Dept Recruitment – Staff Nurse (WB Govt)
jobs.description: Kolkata Municipal Corporation invites applications for Staff Nurse posts. Eligibility: GNM/B.Sc Nursing. Location: Kolkata. Last date: 30 Sep 2025.
jobs.snippet: KMC Staff Nurse openings in Kolkata. Apply by 30 Sep 2025.

jobs.title: TCS Kolkata – Associate Software Engineer (Freshers)
jobs.description: TCS Kolkata hiring fresh graduates. Skills: JavaScript/React preferred. Work location: Kolkata (hybrid). Immediate joining.
jobs.snippet: TCS hiring freshers in Kolkata. Hybrid. Apply now.

jobs.title: Work From Home – EdTech Support (Bengali + English)
jobs.description: WFH role for EdTech startup. Provide chat/email support to learners in Bengali & English. Flexible hours.
jobs.snippet: WFH support role for EdTech; Bengali+English.

news.title: WBPSC announces new schedule for 2025 exams
news.description: WBPSC released an updated calendar for state-level recruitment exams for 2025. Candidates should check the official site.

news.title: Eastern Railway apprentice notification expected soon
news.description: Eastern Railway is likely to release an apprentice notification for West Bengal divisions. Keep documents ready.

exams.title: West Bengal Police Constable Exam – Admit Cards released

exams.snippet: WB Police Constable admit cards available.
